ValidationRule.description: Ensures energy levels are between 1 and 10
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Energy_Level_Morning__c)), OR(Energy_Level_Morning__c < 1, Energy_Level_Morning__c > 10)), AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Energy_Level_Afternoon__c)), OR(Energy_Level_Afternoon__c < 1, Energy_Level_Afternoon__c > 10)), AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Energy_Level_Evening__c)), OR(Energy_Level_Evening__c < 1, Energy_Level_Evening__c > 10)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Energy levels must be between 1 and 10
